metadata.name: THE  SANGAM
metadata.description:
“ THE  SANGAM “

Sangam in Sanskrit means Union. 

In this art  piece , we  see the union or  merging  of two  mighty Himalayan glaciers melting and flowing with rich in minerals carried by their parent glacier.

 “ The Zansar “ Sangam, located in India's Ladakh region,

Ladakh is  a world of rugged valleys, snow-covered mountains, endless hills, clean and curvy roads where centuries old monasteries have still maintained their charm. On our way to the Garkon village, we witnessed the confluence of the Indus and Zanskar rivers which was a rare sight, one can clearly differentiate between the two waters from a distance.



Artist: Kiran Govind

Item: 1/1

Camera: Nikon 850 & Nikon 24-70mm F2.8 Hand held

Dimensions: 5000X3000 , 300 PPI, 6 MB

Location: LADAKAH, INDIA

Date of Capture : July 2017
